case_circumstances: Mostly skeletonized male body found in the bottom of a barranca.
case_facial_hair: A few wiry red-brown hairs are over the left mandibular ramus.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_clothing_on_body:
1. A heavy black and white tweed jacket with a zipper front and long sleeves.  There is a button at the collar and at the bottom of the front of the jacket.  The cuffs of the sleeves each contain two buttons.
2. A leather-type belt with a yellow metal buckle approximately 40" in length.
3. Light blue, light -weight cotton elastic waist pants, with an elastic belt attached to the front. The pants have stitched-in front pleats, and stitched cuffs. The brand is "Angelica" size 38-40, and a firmly affixed label on the left front of the pants reads "DPC Vista Del Mar 9/95 38-40".
4. A wool black and white tweed cap, with a stiff brim and ear-flaps. The cap is insulated and lined, and a label inside the cap reads "Harris Tweed". An additional label inside the hat reads "Eddie Bauer".
case_jewelry: One white metal ring containing a turnbuckle.
case_other_items_with_body:
1. A yellow "Bic" lighter
2. A blue can opener imprinted with the words "Samuel Adams"
dental: Dental information / charting is available and will be entered later
